name: shaadi-mantra
description: Shaadi Mantra - Full Stack Matrimonial Application

scripts.static:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=static DATA_SOURCE=static USE_MONGODB=false PORT=3500 node start.js
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development DATA_SOURCE=mongodb PORT=4500 node start.js
scripts.prod:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DATA_SOURCE=mongodb PORT=5500 node start.js
scripts.static:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3500 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npx cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4500 npm run dev
scripts.prod:frontend: cd frontend && npx cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5500 npm run dev
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install --production
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Shaadi Mantra Team
